SmartClinic_Desktop.name: SmartClinic Desktop
SmartClinic_Desktop.desc: This is Electron based Desktop Application for Dentist/Doctors

meta.maindesc: This is Electron based Desktop Application for Dentist/Doctors to digitalize their work and provide them a better experience. Its not completed yet, but it is a work in progress.

SpotiFusion is a Music Organizer web application. It is based on TAG system, it allows user to create, modify playlist on the basis of TAGS.This application makes it easy to sort through large music libraries.
This application helps you keep track of your Expenses and Income. It gets the data from the Bank transaction SMS. You can analyze your expenses and Income.
Created a website for Police to track crime record visually on Map, based on the previous crime. It maps crime on the basis of previous FIR details
